passives.effects: Dealing magic damage to enemy champions inflicts them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds, increased to 60% if the target is below 50% of their maximum health.

passives.name: Legendary
passives.effects: This item counts as a Legendary item.

3179.name: Umbral Glaive
3179.simpleDescription: Provides trap and ward detection periodically

passives.effects: +12 Lethality (7.47 âˆ’ 12 (based on level) armor penetration)

passives.name: Blackout
passives.effects: When spotted by enemy wards or traps, gain Blackout over a 400-unit radius for 8 seconds (45 second cooldown). You disable surrounding wards, as well as expose and reveal stealthed wards and traps. The effects linger for 2 seconds after you walk away.
Your basic attacks instantly kill revealed traps and deal triple damage to wards.

3181.name: Sanguine Blade
3181.simpleDescription: When hunting lone enemy champions gain Attack Speed and Lethality

passives.effects: +10 Lethality (6.22 âˆ’ 10 (based on level) armor penetration)

passives.name: Frenzy
passives.effects: While near one or fewer visible enemy champions gain 8 lethality and 20% âˆ’ 80% (based on level) bonus attack speed, decaying over 3 seconds if other enemy champions get too close (1350 radius).

passives.name: Legendary
passives.effects: This item counts as a Legendary item.

3190.simpleDescription: Activate to shield nearby allies from damage

passives.name: Passive
passives.effects: Empowers each of your other Legendary items to increase Consecrate's bonus resistances by 2.

active.effects: Grant nearby allies a 230 âˆ’ 385 (based on target's level) shield that decays over 2.5 seconds (90 second cooldown).

passives.name: Witch's Path
passives.effects: Killing a unit grants 1 bonus armor, up to a maximum of 30.

3193.name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
3193.simpleDescription: Greatly increases defense near multiple enemies.

passives.name: Fortify
passives.effects: Increase your bonus armor and bonus magic resistance by 3% for 6 seconds when a champion deals damage to you, stacks up to 5 times for a maximum of 15%. This stacks once per champion.

active.name: Monolith
active.effects: Gain a 100 (+ 100% bonus health) shield that decays over 2.5 seconds and +25% increased size (90 second cooldown).

3211.name: Spectre's Cowl
3211.simpleDescription: Improves defense and grants regeneration upon being damaged

passives.name: Incorporeal
passives.effects: After taking damage, gain 150% base health regeneration for up to 10 seconds. Duration increases with damage taken.

3222.name: Mikael's Blessing
3222.simpleDescription: Activate to remove all disabling effects from an allied champion

active.name: Purify
active.effects: Remove all crowd control debuffs (except Airborne, Blind, Disarm, Ground, Nearsight, and Suppression) from yourself or an allied champion and heal the target for 100 âˆ’ 200 (based on target's level) (120 second cooldown).

Consume a charge to place a visible Effigy at the target location (X range), which reveals the surrounding area. The effigy visually appears exactly as Fiddlesticks does to enemies while idle. Enemy champions that approach an effigy while having sight of it will activate it, causing the effigy to fake a random action, after which the effigy will deal 1 damage to itself. Stores one charge every 115 âˆ’ 30 (based on level) seconds, up to 2 maximum charges.

Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location (600 range), which reveals the surrounding area for 90 âˆ’ 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds. Stores one charge every 240 âˆ’ 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds, up to 2 maximum charges.

3363.name: Farsight Alteration
3363.simpleDescription: Grants increased range and reveals the targetted area

active.effects: Reveals an area up to 4000 units away for 2 seconds (198 âˆ’ 99 (based on average of all champion levels) second cooldown). Enemy champions inside the area at the time of placement will be revealed for 5 seconds. This does not affect stealthed champions. Also places a visible Farsight Ward at the target location that lasts indefinitely.

3364.name: Oracle Lens
3364.simpleDescription: Disables nearby invisible wards and traps for a duration

active.effects: Summons a Sweeper Drone that escorts you for the next 10 seconds (90 âˆ’ 60 (based on average of all champion levels) second cooldown). The drone has a 750-unit detection radius.

passives.effects: Healing or shielding allied champions enhances you and them with 10% âˆ’ 30% (based on target's level) bonus attack speed and 5 âˆ’ 20 (based on target's level) bonus magic damage on-hit on basic attacks for 6 seconds.

active.effects: For 4 seconds, grants 75% bonus movement speed and ghosting when moving towards a turret or visible enemy champion (2000 radius). After the duration or when an enemy champion is within 225 range, you emit a shockwave, slowing enemy champions within 450 range by 40% for 1.5 seconds (90 second cooldown).

passives.name: Immolate
passives.effects: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 12 âˆ’ 30 (based on level) (+ 1% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within 325 (+100% bonus size) units, increased by 25% against minions and 100% against monsters. Damaging enemy champions or epic monsters with this effect adds a stack for 5 seconds, increasing subsequent Immolate damage by 10%, stacking up to 6 times for a 60% increase.

passives.name: Flametouch
passives.effects: At maximum stacks, your basic attacks explode around you, burning nearby enemies for your current Immolate damage for 3 seconds.

passives.name: Passive
passives.effects: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.

passives.name: Immolate
passives.effects: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 12 âˆ’ 30 (based on level) (+ 1% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within 325 (+100% bonus size) units, increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters.

passives.name: Snowbind
passives.effects: Basic attacks create a 250 unit frost field that slows enemies within by 25% (+ 4% per 1000 maximum health) for 1.5 seconds (4 second cooldown).

passives.name: Passive
passives.effects: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 100 health and 6% increased size.

passives.name: Passive
passives.effects: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 3% bonus movement speed.

active.name: Cloudburst
active.effects: Dash to the target location (450 range, 200 minimum), though not through terrain, and fire three homing missiles at the enemy with the most missing health within ~750 radius of you at the end of the dash, prioritizing enemy champions. Each missile deals 60 âˆ’ 105 (based on level) (+ 15% bonus AD) magic damage, for a total of 180 âˆ’ 315 (based on level) (+ 45% bonus AD), increased by 0% âˆ’ 50% (based on target's missing health) (60 second cooldown).

passives.name: Bring It Down
passives.effects: Basic attacks on-attack grant a stack for 3 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks on-attack to deal 60 (+ 45% bonus AD) bonus true damage on-hit.

passives.name: Passive
passives.effects: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 10% bonus attack speed.

passives.name: Lifeline
passives.effects: If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a shield that absorbs 250 âˆ’ 700 (based on level) damage for 3 seconds and 15% life steal for 8 seconds (90 second cooldown).

passives.name: Passive
passives.effects: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 bonus attack damage and 50 bonus health.

passives.name: Void Corruption
passives.effects: For each second in combat with champions, deal 2% increased damage, stacking up to 5 times for a maximum of 10%. While this effect is fully stacked, convert 100% of the bonus damage into true damage.

passives.name: Passive
passives.effects: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5% magic penetration.

passives.name: Soulrend
passives.effects: Damaging an enemy champion deals 125 (+ 15% AP) bonus magic damage and grants you 25% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds, with the duration extending upon damaging new champions (40 second cooldown per champion).

passives.effects: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.

passives.name: Passive

active.name: Supersonic
active.effects: Dash in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of 7 rockets that deal 125 (+ 15% AP) magic damage. Then, gain 50% bonus movement speed toward enemy champions for 2 seconds (40 second cooldown).Supersonic resets the user's basic attack timer.

passives.name: Torment
passives.effects: Dealing ability damage burns enemies, causing them to take[ 60 (+ 6% AP) (+ 4% target's maximum health) total magic damage over 4 seconds ][ 7.5 (+ 0.75% AP) (+ 0.5% target's maximum health) magic damage every 0.5 seconds for 4 seconds ]and the user to ignore 5% of their magic resistance for the duration, increasing by 5% per second over the duration, up to 15%.

passives.name: Echo
passives.effects: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) bonus magic damage to your target and 3 nearby enemies and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds (10 second cooldown).

passives.effects: Gain 0% âˆ’ 15% (based on missing health) bonus attack damage.

active.effects: Deal 100% AD physical damage to enemies in a 400-unit radius around you. Heal for 25% AD (+ 12% of your missing health) for each enemy champion hit (15 second cooldown, reduced by ability haste, minimum 7 seconds).

passives.effects: Dealing physical damage grants you 30 bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.

active.name: Halting Slash

passives.name: Spellblade
passives.effects: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 10% of target's maximum health bonus physical damage on-hit, with a minimum damage equal to 150% of base AD and a maximum damage against monsters equal to 250% base AD. If the target is a champion, heal for ( 50% / 30%) of the pre-mitigation bonus damage dealt (1.5 second cooldown, begins after using the empowered attack).

passives.name: Passive
passives.effects: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5% armor penetration and 5% magic penetration.

passives.name: Threefold Strike
passives.effects: Basic attacks grant 25 bonus movement speed for 3 seconds. If the target is a champion also increases base attack damage by 6% for the same duration, stacking up to 5 times for a 30% increase.

passives.name: Spellblade
passives.effects: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 200% base AD bonus physical damage on-hit (1.5 second cooldown, begins after using the empowered attack).

passives.name: Passive

passives.name: Passive
passives.effects: Empowers each of your other Legendary items to increase Consecrate's bonus resistances by 2.

active.name: Devotion
active.effects: Grant nearby allies a 230 âˆ’ 385 (based on target's level) shield that decays over 2.5 seconds (90 second cooldown).

active.name: Inspire
active.effects: Grants you and nearby allies 60% bonus movement speed that decays over 4 seconds. Additionally, you and affected allied champions deal 35 âˆ’ 55 (based on target's level) bonus magic damage on the next 3 attacks or ability hits against champions (90 second cooldown).

passives.name: Starlit Grace
passives.effects: When affecting champions with attacks or abilities in combat, heal the nearby allied champion with the most missing health for 70 âˆ’ 100 (based on target's level) (2 second cooldown). Each second spent in combat with champions increases this heal by 12.5%, stacking up to 4 times for maximum of 50%.

passives.effects: Abilities that slow or immobilize enemy champions deal 36 âˆ’ 60 (based on level) bonus magic damage and mark them for 4 seconds. Allied champions that damage marked enemies consume the mark to deal 90 âˆ’ 150 (based on ally's level) bonus magic damage and grant you and the triggering ally 20% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds (6 second cooldown per enemy champion).
